stimulusHtml: Two nonzero vectors are parallel. Which of the following describes the relationship between these vectors?
choicesHtml: The dot product of one vector with the other must equal 0.
The dot product of one vector with the other must equal 1.
The components of one vector must be nonzero multiples of the components of the other vector.
The magnitude of one vector must be the same as the magnitude of the other vector.
